abstract: The top-selling computer book this year is an iPhone application, showing how Apple has created a new market for paid content.
snippet: The top-selling computer book this year is an iPhone application, showing how Apple has created a new market for paid content.
lead_paragraph: It may be no surprise that the best-selling computer book so far this year is “iPhone: The Missing Manual,” by my colleague David Pogue (O’Reilly, 2007).

headline.main: Why Are iPhone Users Willing to Pay for Content?
